keywhiz.testing

Class JsonHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • keywhiz.testing.JsonHelpers

  • public class JsonHelpers
extends Object
    A set of helper methods for testing the serialization and deserialization of classes to and from JSON.

    For example, a test for reading and writing a Person object as JSON:

    
 assertThat("writing a person as JSON produces the appropriate JSON object",
            asJson(person),
            is(jsonFixture("fixtures/person.json"));

 assertThat("reading a JSON object as a person produces the appropriate person",
            fromJson(jsonFixture("fixtures/person.json"), Person.class),
            is(person));

                     throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Converts the given object into a canonical JSON string.
        Parameters:
        object - an object
        Returns:
        object as a JSON string
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there is an error encoding object

      • fromJson

        public static <T> T fromJson(String json,
                             Class<T> klass)
                      throws IOException
        Converts the given JSON string into an object of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type that json should be converted to
        Parameters:
        json - a JSON string
        klass - the class of the type that json should be converted to
        Returns:
        json as an instance of T
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error reading json as an instance of T

      • jsonFixture

        public static String jsonFixture(String filename)
                          throws IOException
        Loads the given fixture resource as a normalized JSON string.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename of the fixture
        Returns:
        the contents of filename as a normalized JSON string
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error parsing filename
